track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description:
Calling out all first timers and those new to competitive programming. RookieRank invites all levels of programmers who have never participated in a rated algorithms competition before to experience the thrill!
RookieRank begins Friday, February 10, at 9am PST. Rookies will have 48 hours (until February 12 at 9am PST) to solve 5 algorithm challenges.
We will have two leaderboards. One for all first time competitve programmers. These are users who are not listed on the Algorithms Leaderboard.
We will have a separate leaderboard for all rated users. These are users who have participated in a rated algorithms contest before.
primary_contest.name: RookieRank 2

model.name: Minimum Absolute Difference in an Array
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin", "r");
function minimumAbsoluteDifference($n, $arr) {
    // Complete this function
}

fscanf($handle, "%i",$n);
$arr_temp = fgets($handle);
$arr = explode(" ",$arr_temp);
$arr = array_map('intval', $arr);
$result = minimumAbsoluteDifference($n, $arr);
echo $result . "\n";

?>
model.ruby_template:
#!/bin/ruby

def minimumAbsoluteDifference(n, arr)
    # Complete this function
end

n = gets.strip.to_i
arr = gets.strip
arr = arr.split(' ').map(&:to_i)
result = minimumAbsoluteDifference(n, arr)
puts result
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    n_temp <- getLine
    let n = read n_temp :: Int
    arr_temp <- getLine
    let arr = map read $ words arr_temp :: [Int]

getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Given a list of integers, calculate their differences and find the difference with the smallest absolute value.
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
    let [
      n_t (read-line) 
      n (Integer/parseInt n_t) 
    ]

  (
    let [
      arr_temp (read-line) 
      arr_t (split arr_temp #"\s+") 
      arr (map #(Integer/parseInt %) arr_t) 
    ]
  )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [N]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    Arr = read_array(N,"~d"),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
function minimumAbsoluteDifference(n, arr)
    -- Complete this function

n = io.read("*number", "*l")
arr = {}
arr_temp = io.read()
arr_i = 1
for token in string.gmatch(arr_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	arr[arr_i] = token
	arr_i = arr_i + 1
end
